scripts.build:devpub: npm run compile:dev && npm run publish-extension
scripts.pubdev: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension publish --service-url https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/ --rev-version --auth-type pat --token h55o6i3zpvaaqc3nzwwjmicadh5oh6p4zaw67xlqdtmplonydaca --share-with dubsalot --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json ./src/Hubs/Pipeview/pipeview-dev.json
scripts.pub: npm run compile && npm run publishext
scripts.publishext: tfx extension publish --service-url https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/ --rev-version --auth-type pat --token h55o6i3zpvaaqc3nzwwjmicadh5oh6p4zaw67xlqdtmplonydaca --share-with dubsalot --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json ./src/Hubs/Pipeview/pipeview-dev.json
scripts.local: npm run compile:dev && start http://localhost:8080/Pipeview/LocalPipeview.html && webpack-dev-server --mode development --env.useFakes=true
